name: Scummy
description:
Scummy is a totally normal not at all a rage game platformer... definitely not a rage game...  100% not.

You're a cute thingy and your goal is to reach the hospital as quick as you can.

But there are obstacles along the way like swinging axes, spikes, etc..

Try to win the game as quick as possible and just so you know the game can be beaten in 2 : 17.

Goodluck (;
